_instructions.prompt: Fill this JSON homepage template using the provided client questionnaire. REQUIREMENTS: (1) Match the tone and positioning described in the questionnaire - extract their goals, values, and how they want to differentiate themselves. (2) Incorporate SEO keywords: [business name], [location], 'Thai massage', 'massage therapist', plus their specific treatment types. (3) Respect character limits per section. (4) Use specific details from questionnaire (years experience, qualifications, specialties, unique selling points, business goals). (5) Make content compelling and authentic to their brand vision. (6) If unclear about positioning, default to professional yet warm and welcoming tone.

hero.title: Primary Service Keyword + Location + Unique Benefit
hero.text: Brief compelling description highlighting what makes you different and why customers should choose you. Include a secondary benefit or service feature.

services.topper: Our Services Category (e.g., Thai Massage, Spa Treatments)
services.title: SEO Optimized Services Heading - Include Keywords
services.description: Compelling description of your services offering. Highlight what makes your treatments unique and the benefits clients will experience. Keep it 2-3 sentences for optimal engagement.

service1.name: First Service Name
service1.description: Brief compelling description highlighting key benefits and unique aspects of this service

service2.name: Second Service Name
service2.description: Brief compelling description highlighting key benefits and unique aspects of this service

service3.name: Third Service Name
service3.description: Brief compelling description highlighting key benefits and unique aspects of this service

service4.name: Fourth Service Name
service4.description: Brief compelling description highlighting key benefits and unique aspects of this service

whyUs.title: Why Choose Your Thai Massage
whyUs.description: Compelling description explaining what sets your business apart from competitors. Focus on expertise, quality, experience, and customer satisfaction. Keep it 2-3 sentences.

reason1.title: First Reason Title
reason1.description: Brief explanation of this benefit and how it helps customers achieve their goals or solve their problems

reason2.title: Second Reason Title
reason2.description: Brief explanation of this benefit and how it helps customers achieve their goals or solve their problems

reason3.title: Third Reason Title
reason3.description: Brief explanation of this benefit and how it helps customers achieve their goals or solve their problems

whyUs.testimonial: A testimonial from a customer or a quote from the business owner

about.title: About Heading
about.paragraph1: First paragraph introducing your business, background, expertise, and what makes you unique. Focus on establishing credibility and connecting with your audience.
about.paragraph2: Second paragraph elaborating on your mission, values, approach, or experience. Highlight what sets you apart and why customers should trust you.
about.imageAlt: Descriptive alt text for about image

featured1.title: SEO Optimized Featured Heading
featured1.paragraph1: First paragraph describing your featured service, treatment, or specialty. Explain what makes it unique and the benefits clients will experience.
featured1.paragraph2: Second paragraph with additional details, results, or reasons why clients should try this featured offering. Build excitement and credibility.
featured1.imageAlt: Descriptive alt text for featured images

featured2.title: SEO Optimized Second Featured Heading
featured2.paragraph1: First paragraph for your second featured section. Highlight a different service or treatment specialty.
featured2.paragraph2: Second paragraph with additional details about this featured offering.
featured2.imageAlt: Descriptive alt text for second featured images

reviews.title: SEO Optimized Reviews Heading - Build Trust
reviews.description: Brief introduction explaining the value of customer feedback and your commitment to client satisfaction. Keep it 1-2 sentences.

review1.text: First client testimonial. Include specific benefits they experienced, results achieved, or what they appreciated most about your service. Keep authentic and relatable.
review1.name: Client Name or Initials

review2.text: Second client testimonial. Highlight different aspects of your service - quality, professionalism, results, or experience. Vary the focus from review1.
review2.name: Client Name or Initials

review3.text: Second client testimonial. Highlight different aspects of your service - quality, professionalism, results, or experience. Vary the focus from review1.
review3.name: Client Name or Initials

faq.topper: FAQ Section Label (e.g., FAQ's, Common Questions)
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.imageAlt: Descriptive alt text for FAQ image
faq.question1: First common question about your services (e.g., What should I expect during my first visit?)
faq.answer1: Clear, helpful answer addressing the question. Provide specific details that help potential clients understand what to expect.
faq.question2: Second common question (e.g., How long does a typical session last?)
faq.answer2: Detailed answer providing useful information. Be specific about timing, process, or other relevant details.
faq.question3: Third common question (e.g., Do I need to book in advance?)
faq.answer3: Informative answer that helps clients plan and prepare. Include any important details or recommendations.
faq.question4: Fourth common question (e.g., What should I wear for my appointment?)
faq.answer4: Practical answer with clear guidance. Help clients feel prepared and comfortable.
faq.question5: Fifth common question (e.g., What are your cancellation policies?)
faq.answer5: Professional answer explaining your policies clearly. Be transparent and helpful.
